definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ne 11:25 settled abode, settlement, village (Lag:l. c.)—always pl., abs. [[חֲחֵרִים]] Jos 19:8 + 5 t.; cstr. [[חַחְרֵי]] 1Ch 9:16, Ne 12:28; sf. [[חֲחֵרֶיהָ]] Jos 21:12 + 4 t.; [[חַחְרֵיהֶם]] 1Ch 4:33 + 6 t.; [[חַחְרֵיהֶן]] Jos 13:23 + 24 t. Jos;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: settlements of Ishmaelites Ge 25:16 (P; ‖[[טִירוֹת]] circles of tents); of [[עַוִּים]] De 2:23; of Kedar Is 42:11 (‖[[עָרִים]]); [[בָּתֵּי]] [[הַחֲחֵרִים אֲשֶׁר אֵין־לָהֶם חׂמָה סָבִיב]] Le 25:31 (H), houses of the villages which have no wall about them; [[מַאֲרַב חֲחֵרִים]] Ps 10:8 lurking-place(s) of villages (i.e. where oppressor, as a wild beast, watches his opportunity to attack the defenceless). Usu.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as dependencies of cities Jos 15:46, with [[בְּנׁתֶיהָ]] (v. supr. [[בַּת]]

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: villages, not contrasted with cities (cf. Is 42:11 supr.) 1Ch 9:16, 1Ch 9:22, 1Ch 9:25 (all of Levites).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: ´[[ח]] appar. incl. all settlements outside of Jerusalem ´[[הַח]] [[בִּשְׂדׂתָם]] Ne 11:25.—´[[ח]] in n.pr.loc. v. infr. (and see Bla on Jos 15:20 – Jos 15:32).
